attributes.action: STOP THIS MADNESS BEFORE IT RUINS US ALL. MP's must act before we're all ruined.
attributes.additional_details:
FTSE PLUMETING
£ PLUMETING
HATE ATTACKS RISING
AAA CREDIT RATINGS GONE
COUNTRY DIVIDED
attributes.background:
It is quite obvious that the post referendum chaos is beginning to unravel our great country and threaten us with a complete breakdown of our economy and way of life.
There must be an emergency debate where MP's can have a free vote to stop things getting even worse. Parliament has a DUTY OF CARE.
